surfaces

Class Spiral

  • java.lang.Object
    • surfaces.Surface3D
      • surfaces.ParametricSurface3D
        • surfaces.Spiral
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Labelizable

    public class Spiral
extends ParametricSurface3D
    Creates a parametric surface with the mathematical functions of a spiral.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class surfaces.ParametricSurface3D

        SIMPSON, TRAPEZOID

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spiral

        public Spiral(double t0,
              double t1,
              double s0,
              double s1,
              int n1,
              int n2)
        Creates a new spiral with the given information
        Parameters:
        t0 - Lower bound for the first parametric parameter.
        t1 - Upper bound for the first parametric parameter.
        s0 - Lower bound for the second parametric parameter.
        s1 - Upper bound for the second parametric parameter.
        n1 - Resolution for triangulation.
        n2 - Resolution for triangulation.
